Class CrudForCollectionDataDataHandler<TEntity, TIdType, TDbContext>

Namespace
Quickie.DataHandlers.Crud.Implementation
Assembly
Quickie.dll

Abstract class serving as CRUD for collection request handler.

public abstract class CrudForCollectionDataDataHandler<TEntity, TIdType, TDbContext> : ICrudForCollectionDataHandler<TEntity, TIdType> where TEntity : CrudEntity where TIdType : IComparable where TDbContext : DbContext
